entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries or rain showers beginning overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
